Posts.Content: hi re mum with brain mets breast cancer my sister 43 in same position wth multiple brain tumours fo last 5 yrs memory los was told so many times no more could be done but we researched internet and fought for everything we coul to buy more time so my advice is to ask for anything you think would help and dont take no for answer we have had 5 yrs we may not have by research and demanding help hope this helps
Posts.Title: breast gone to brain
